changeSet.author: Nastya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE Book( bookId INT(11) AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, author VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, price INT(20) NOT NULL, year INT(11), publisher VARCHAR(20), genre VARCHAR(20), PRIMARY KEY (bookId));

changeSet.author: Nastya
changeSet.sql: Insert into Book values(1, 'Почему не Эванс?', 'Агата Кристи', '7', 2018, 'Ашет', 'Детектив');

changeSet.author: Nastya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE User( userId INT(11) AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, login VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (userId));
